meanings.definition: The act of directing one's interest outward or to things outside oneself.
meanings.sent1: His extroversions were evident as he eagerly engaged with everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: She displayed extroversions by actively participating in group activities.
meanings.sent3: The extroversions of the curious puppy led it to explore every corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: Her extroversions shone brightly like a beacon in a sea of introverted personalities.
meanings.sent5: The extroversions of the sunflowers reaching towards the sun symbolized growth and vitality.

meanings.definition: The quality of being outgoing and sociable.
meanings.sent1: His extroversions made him the life of the party, always surrounded by friends.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed social gatherings, showcasing her extroversions effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The extroversions of the talkative parrot entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her extroversions were like a warm embrace, welcoming everyone into her circle.
meanings.sent5: The extroversions of the bustling marketplace created a lively and vibrant atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: His extroversions made him a natural leader, always ready to take charge.
meanings.sent2: She embraced her extroversions, using them to connect with people effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The extroversions of the energetic child filled the room with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her extroversions were like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day, brightening everyone's mood.
meanings.sent5: The extroversions of the enthusiastic team created a positive and dynamic work environment.
